Class ClusterFilters

extends Object
    Predefined cluster filters.

    • Method Detail

      • forNext

        public static ClusterFilter forNext()
        Filters nodes using a ring structure based on natural nodes ordering.

        This filter uses the natural sort order to organize all cluster nodes as a ring and selects a node which is next to the local node. If local node is not within the cluster topology then empty set is returned.

        Returns:
        Filter.

      • forNextInJoinOrder

        public static ClusterFilter forNextInJoinOrder()
        Filters nodes using a ring structure based on nodes join order.

        This filter organizes all cluster nodes as a ring in their ClusterNode.joinOrder() and selects a node which is next to the local node. If local node is not within the cluster topology then empty set is returned.

        Returns:
        Filter.

      • forNode

        Returns:

      • forYoungest

        public static ClusterFilter forYoungest()
        Filters out all nodes but the youngest one (with the largest ClusterNode.joinOrder()).
        Returns:
        Filter.
